00030 from xml.parsers import expat

00043 class SearchFormContainer( QWidget ):
00044         def __init__(self, parent):
00045                 QWidget.__init__( self, parent )
00046                 layout = QGridLayout( self )
00047                 layout.setSpacing( 10 )
00048                 layout.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00049                 # Maximum number of columns
00050                 self.col = 4
00051                 self.x = 0
00052                 self.y = 0
00053 
00054         def addWidget(self, widget, name=None):
00055                 if self.x + 1 > self.col:
00056                         self.x = 0
00057                         self.y = self.y + 1
00058 
00059                 # Add gridLine attribute to all widgets so we can easily discover
00060                 # in which line they are.
00061                 widget.gridLine = self.y
00062                 if name:
00063                         label = QLabel( name )
00064                         label.gridLine = self.y
00065                         vbox = QVBoxLayout()
00066                         vbox.setSpacing( 0 )
00067                         vbox.setContentsMargins( 0, 0, 0, 0 )
00068                         vbox.addWidget( label, 0 )
00069                         vbox.addWidget( widget )
00070                         self.layout().addLayout( vbox, self.y, self.x )
00071                 else:
00072                         self.layout().addWidget( widget, self.y, self.x )
00073                 self.x = self.x + 1
00074 
00075 class SearchFormParser(object):
00076         def __init__(self, container, fields, model=''):
00077                 self.fields = fields
00078                 self.container = container
00079                 self.model = model
00080                 self.focusable = None
00081                 self.widgets = {}
00082 
00083         def _psr_start(self, name, attrs):
00084                 if name in ('form','tree','svg'):
00085                         self.title = attrs.get('string','Form')
00086                 elif name=='field':
00087                         select = attrs.get('select', False) or self.fields[attrs['name']].get('select', False)
00088                         if select:
00089                                 name = attrs['name']
00090                                 type = attrs.get('widget', self.fields[name]['type'])
00091                                 self.fields[name].update(attrs)
00092                                 self.fields[name]['model']=self.model
00093                                 widget = SearchWidgetFactory.create(type, name, self.container, self.fields[name])
00094                                 if not widget:
00095                                         return
00096                                 self.widgetDict[str(name)] = widget
00097 
00098                                 select = str(select)
00099                                 if select in self.widgets:
00100                                         self.widgets[ str(select) ].append( widget )
00101                                 else:
00102                                         self.widgets[ select ] = [ widget ]
00103 
00104         def _psr_end(self, name):
00105                 pass
00106         def _psr_char(self, char):
00107                 pass
00108         def parse(self, xml_data):
00109                 psr = expat.ParserCreate()
00110                 psr.StartElementHandler = self._psr_start
00111                 psr.EndElementHandler = self._psr_end
00112                 psr.CharacterDataHandler = self._psr_char
00113                 self.widgetDict={}
00114                 psr.Parse(xml_data.encode('utf-8'))
00115 
00116                 previousWidget = None
00117                 for line in sorted( self.widgets.keys() ):
00118                         for widget in self.widgets[ line ]:
00119                                 if 'string' in self.fields[widget.name]:
00120                                         label = self.fields[widget.name]['string']+' :'
00121                                 else:
00122                                         label = None
00123                                 self.container.addWidget( widget, label )
00124                                 if previousWidget:
00125                                         QWidget.setTabOrder( previousWidget.focusWidget, widget.focusWidget )
00126                                 previousWidget = widget
00127                                 if not self.focusable:
00128                                         self.focusable = widget
00129                 return self.widgetDict
00130 
00131 (SearchFormWidgetUi, SearchFormWidgetBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('searchform.ui') )

00133 ## @brief This class provides a form with the fields to search given a model.
00134 class SearchFormWidget(AbstractSearchWidget, SearchFormWidgetUi):
00135         ## @brief Constructs a new SearchFormWidget.
00136         def __init__(self, parent=None):
00137                 AbstractSearchWidget.__init__(self, '', parent)
00138                 SearchFormWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00139                 self.setupUi( self )
00140                 
00141                 self.model = None
00142                 self.widgets = {}
00143                 self.name = ''
00144                 self.focusable = True
00145                 self.expanded = True
00146                 self._loaded = False
00147 
00148                 self.connect( self.pushExpander, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.toggleExpansion )
00149                 self.connect( self.pushClear, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.clear )
00150                 self.connect( self.pushSearch, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.search )
00151 
00152                 self.pushExpander.setEnabled( False )
00153                 self.pushClear.setEnabled( False )
00154                 self.pushSearch.setEnabled( False )
00155 
00156         # @brief Returns if it's been already loaded that is
00157         # setup has been called.
00158         def isLoaded(self):
00159                 return self._loaded
00160 
00161         # @brief Returns True if it has no widgets.
00162         def isEmpty(self):
00163                 if len(self.widgets):
00164                         return False
00165                 else:
00166                         return True
00167 
00168         def setup(self, xml, fields, model):
00169                 # We allow one setup call only
00170                 if self._loaded:
00171                         return 
00172 
00173                 self._loaded = True
00174                 self.pushExpander.setEnabled( True )
00175                 self.pushClear.setEnabled( True )
00176                 self.pushSearch.setEnabled( True )
00177 
00178                 parser = SearchFormParser(self.uiContainer, fields, model)
00179                 self.model = model
00180 
00181                 self.widgets = parser.parse(xml)
00182                 for widget in self.widgets.values():
00183                         self.connect( widget, SIGNAL('keyDownPressed()'), self, SIGNAL('keyDownPressed()') )
00184 
00185                 # Don't show expander button unless there are widgets in the
00186                 # second row
00187                 self.pushExpander.hide()
00188                 for x in self.widgets.values():
00189                         if x.gridLine > 0:
00190                                 self.pushExpander.show()
00191                                 break
00192 
00193                 self.name = parser.title
00194                 self.focusable = parser.focusable
00195                 self.expanded = True
00196                 self.toggleExpansion()
00197                 return 
00198 
00199         def keyPressEvent(self, event):
00200                 if event.key() in ( Qt.Key_Return, Qt.Key_Enter ):
00201                         self.search()
00202 
00203         def search(self):
00204                 self.emit( SIGNAL('search()') )
00205 
00206         def showButtons(self):
00207                 self.pushClear.setVisible( True )
00208                 self.pushSearch.setVisible( True )
00209 
00210         def hideButtons(self):
00211                 self.pushClear.setVisible( False )
00212                 self.pushSearch.setVisible( False )
00213 
00214         def toggleExpansion(self):
00215                 layout = self.uiContainer.layout()
00216                 
00217                 childs = self.uiContainer.children()
00218                 for x in childs:
00219                         if x.isWidgetType() and x.gridLine > 0:
00220                                 if self.expanded:
00221                                         x.hide()
00222                                 else:
00223                                         x.show()
00224                 self.expanded = not self.expanded
00225                 if self.expanded:
00226                         self.pushExpander.setIcon( QIcon(':/images/up.png') )
00227                 else:
00228                         self.pushExpander.setIcon( QIcon(':/images/down.png') )
00229                 
00230         def setFocus(self):
00231                 if self.focusable:
00232                         self.focusable.setFocus()
00233                 else:
00234                         QWidget.setFocus(self)
00235 
00236         def clear(self):
00237                 for x in self.widgets.values():
00238                         x.clear()
00239 
00240         def value(self, domain=[]):
00241                 res = []
00242                 for x in self.widgets:
00243                         res += self.widgets[x].value()
00244                 v_keys = [x[0] for x in res]
00245                 for f in domain:
00246                         if f[0] not in v_keys:
00247                                 res.append(f)
00248                 return res
00249 
00250         def setValue(self, val):
00251                 for x in val:
00252                         if x in self.widgets:
00253                                 self.widgets[x].value = val[x]
